T02n3011u_001:3: natvā sarasvatīṁ devīṁ śuddhāṁ guṇyāṁ karomyaham |

T02n3011u_001:131: ka kha iti kakhābhyāṁ prāgardhavisargasadṛśo jihvāmūlīyaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:132: pa pha iti paphābhyāṁ prāgardhavisargasadṛśa upadhmānīyaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:140: ku cu ṭu tu pu ete uditaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:169: ikaḥ sthāne yaṇ syādaci saṁhitāyāṁ viṣaye |

T02n3011u_001:181: su dh y upāsya iti jāte |
T02n3011u_001:186: acaḥ parasya yaro dve vā sto na tvaci |
T02n3011u_001:197: saṁyogāntaṁ yat padaṁ tadantasya lopaḥ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:213: ecaḥ kramāday av āy āv ete syuraci |
T02n3011u_001:227: (12) yakārādau pratyaye pare odautorav āv etau staḥ |
T02n3011u_001:241: taḥ paro yasmāt sa ca tātparaścoccāryamāṇaḥ samakālasyaiva saṁjñā syāt |
T02n3011u_001:259: ṛ iti triṁśataḥ saṁjñettyuktaṁ tatsthāne yo'ṇ sa raparaḥ sanneva pravarttete |
T02n3011u_001:271: sapādasaptādhyāyīṁ prati tripādyasiddhā tripādyāmapi pūrvaṁ prati paraṁ śāstramasiddham |
T02n3011u_001:368: acāṁ madhye yo'ntyaḥ sa ādiryasya taṭṭisaṁjñaṁ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:388: akaḥ savarṇe'ci pare pūrvaparayordīrgha ekādeśaḥ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:404: loke vede caiṅantasya gorati vā prakṛtibhāvaḥ padānte |
T02n3011u_001:440: dūrāt saṁbodhane vākyasya ṭeḥ pluto vā |
T02n3011u_001:497: saṁbuddhinimitaka okāro va pragṛhyo'vaidika itau pare |
T02n3011u_001:521: acaḥ parābhyāṁ rephahakārābhyāṁ parasya yaro dve vā staḥ |

T02n3011u_001:623: halaḥ parasya jharo vā lopaḥ savarṇe jhari |
T02n3011u_001:637: nādasya ghoṣasya saṁvārasya ma- hāprāṇasya tādṛśo vargacaturthaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:645: tad śiva ityatra dasya cutvena jakāre kṛte khari ceti jakārasya cakāraḥ |
T02n3011u_001:678: kvibante rājatau pare samo masya ma eva syāt |
T02n3011u_001:684: mapare hakāre pare masya mo vā |
T02n3011u_001:742: hrasvāt paro yo ṅam tadantaṁ yat padaṁ tasmāt parasyāco nityaṁ ṅamuṭ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:801: kavarge pavarge ca visargasya ka pau staḥ |
T02n3011u_001:869: bhos bhagos aghos iti sāntā nipātāḥ |
T02n3011u_001:902: manasratha ityatra rutve kṛte haśi cetyutve ro rīti lope ca prāpte |
T02n3011u_001:914: akakārayoretattadoryaḥ sustasya lopo hali natu nañsamāse |
T02n3011u_001:927: sa ityasya sorlopaḥ syādaci pādaścellope satyeva pūryeta |
T02n3011u_001:936: dhātuṁ pratyayaṁ pratyayāntaṁ ca varjayitvārthavacchabdasvarūpaṁ prātipadi- kasaṁjñaṁ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:966: ṅyantādābantāt prātipadikācca pare svādayaḥ pratyayāḥ syuḥ |
T02n3011u_001:993: ekavibhaktau yāni sarūpāṇyeva dṛṣṭāni teṣāmeka eva śiṣyate |
T02n3011u_001:1033: yaḥ pratyayo yasmāt kriyate tadādi śabdasvarūpaṁ tasmin pratyaye pare'ṅgaṁ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:1058: pūrvasavarṇadīrghāt paro yaḥ śasassastasya naḥ syāt puṁsi |
T02n3011u_001:1063: aṭ kavargaḥ pavarga āṅ num etairvyastairyathāsaṁbhavamilitaiśca vyavadhāne'pi raṣābhyāṁ parasya nasya ṇaḥ samānapade |
T02n3011u_001:1100: iti sthāni- vattvāt supi ceti dīrghaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:1145: iṇkubhyāṁ parasyāpadāntasyādeśaḥ pratyayāvayavaśya yaḥ sastasya mūrdhanyādeśaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:1153: sarva viśva ubha ubhaya ḍatara ḍatama anya anyatara itara tvat tva nema sama sima |
T02n3011u_001:1157: tyad tad yad etad idam adas eka dvi yuṣmad asmad bhavatu kim |
T02n3011u_001:1200: eteṣāṁ vyavasthāyāmasaṁjñāyāṁ sarvanāmasaṁjñā gaṇasūcāt sarvatra yā prāptā sā jasi vā |
T02n3011u_001:1213: jñātidhanānyavācinaḥ svaśabdasya prāptā saṁjñā jasi vā |
T02n3011u_001:1223: bāhye paridhānīye cārthe'ntaraśabdasya prāptā saṁjñā jasi vā |
T02n3011u_001:1293: yādiṣvajādiṣu ca kapratyayāvadhiṣu svādiṣvasarvanāmasthāneṣu pūrvaṁ bhasaṁjñaṁ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:1298: ita ūrdhvaṁ kaḍārāḥ karmadhāraya ityataḥ prāgekasyaikaiva saṁjñā jñeyā |
T02n3011u_001:1334: hrasvau yāvidutau tadantaṁ sakhivarjaṁ ghisaṁ- jñam |
T02n3011u_001:1375: antyādalaḥ pūrvo yo varṇaḥ sa upadhāsaṁjñaḥ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:1389: halantāt paraṁ dīrghau yau ṅyāpau tadantācca paraṁ sutisītyetadapṛktaṁ hallupyate |
T02n3011u_001:1394: prātipadikasaṁjñakaṁ yat padaṁ tadantasya nasya lopaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:1400: sakhyuraṅgāt paraṁ sambuddhivarjaṁ sarvanāmasthānaṁ ṇidvat syāt |
T02n3011u_001:1418: khitiśabdābhyāṁ khītīśabdābhyāṁ katayaṇādeśābhyāṁ parasya ṅasiṅa- sorata uḥ |
T02n3011u_001:1456: lukślulupśabdaiḥ kṛtaṁ pratyayādarśanaṁ kramāt tattatsaṁjñaṁ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:1467: lumatā śabdena lupte tannimittamaṅgakāryaṁ na syāt |
T02n3011u_001:1502: dīrghājjasi ici ca pare na pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:1562: śnupratyayāntasyevarṇovarṇāntasya dhātorbhrū ityasya cāṅgasyeyaṅuvaṅau sto'jādau pratyaye pare |
T02n3011u_001:1568: dhātvavayavasaṁyogapūrvo na bhavati ya ivarṇastadanto yo dhātusta- dantasyānekoco'ṅgasya yaṇajādau pratyaye |
T02n3011u_001:1677: dhātvavayavasaṁyogapūrvo na bhavati ya uvarṇastadanto yo dhātustada- ntaṁsyānekāco'ṅgasya yaṇ syādaci supi |
T02n3011u_001:1691: dṛnbhūḥ dṛnkarapunaḥ pūrvasya bhūvo yaṇ vaktavyaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:1837: varṇovarṇau striyāṁ vā nadīsaṁjñau sto ṅiti |
T02n3011u_001:1860: tisṛ catasṛ etayo rṛkārasya rephādeśaḥ syādaci |
T02n3011u_001:1915: iyaṅuvaṅoḥ sthitiryayostāvīdūtau nadīsaṁjñau na sto na tu strī |
T02n3011u_001:1925: iyaṅuvaṅsthānau stryākhyau yū āmi vā nadīsaṁjñau sto na tu strī |
T02n3011u_001:1995: jhalantasyājantasya ca klībasya num syāt sarvanāmasthāne |
T02n3011u_001:2000: acāṁ madhye yo'ntyastasmāt parastasyaivāntāvayavo mit syāt |
T02n3011u_001:2048: na lumate- tyasyānityatvāt pakṣe sambuddhinimitto guṇaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:2077: aṅgāvayavo'sarvanāmasthānaparo yo'n tasyākārasya lopo vā syā- nṅiśyoḥ parayoḥ |
T02n3011u_001:2146: dhātvavayavasyaikāco jhaṣantasya baśo bhaṣ se dhvepadānte ca |
T02n3011u_001:2157: (88) eṣāṁ hasya vā gho jhali padānte ca |
T02n3011u_001:2217: sāntasya vasvantasya sraṁsādeśca daḥ syāt padānte |
T02n3011u_001:2275: aci pare śaro na dve staḥ |
T02n3011u_001:2358: kiṁcit kāryaṁ vidhātumupātasya kāryāntaraṁ vidhātuṁ punarupādānamanvādeśaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:2372: nasya lopo na ṅau sambuddhau ca |
T02n3011u_001:2383: subvidhau svaravidhau saṁjñāvidhau kṛti tugvidhau nalopo'siddho nānyatra |
T02n3011u_001:2416: (96) ekājuttarapadaṁ yasya tasmin samāse pūrvapadasthānnimittāt parasya prātipadikāntanum-vibhaktisthasya nasya ṇaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:2422: ñiti ṇiti pratyaye nakāre ca pare hanterhakārasya kutvam |
T02n3011u_001:2466: nañā rahitasyārvannantasyāṅgasya tṛ ityantādeśo na tu sau |
T02n3011u_001:2501: ṣāntā nāntā ca saṁkhyā ṣaṭsaṁjñā syāt |
T02n3011u_001:2525: aṣṭabhya iti vaktavye kṛtātvanirdeśo jaśśasorviṣaya ātvaṁ jñāpayati |
T02n3011u_001:2544: aca dhātvadhikāre tiṅbhinnaḥ pratyayaḥ kṛtsaṁjñaḥ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:2554: kvin pratyayo yasmāt tasya kavargo'ntādeśaḥ padānte |
T02n3011u_001:2596: parāvupapade vrajeḥ kvip syāddīrghaśca padānte ṣatvamapi |
T02n3011u_001:2612: padānte jhali ca yaḥ saṁyogastadādyoḥ skorlopaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:2769: padāt parayorapādādau sthitayoḥ ṣaṣṭhyādiviśiṣṭayorvāṁnāvāvityā- deśau staḥ |
T02n3011u_001:2785: śrīśastvāvatu māpīha dattāt te me'pi śarma saḥ |
T02n3011u_001:2786: svāmī te me'pi sa hariḥ pātu vāmapi nau vibhuḥ ||
T02n3011u_001:2787: sukhaṁ vāṁ nau dadātvīśaḥ patirvāmapi nau hariḥ |
T02n3011u_001:2788: so'vyādvo naḥ śivaṁ vo no dadyāt sevyo'ca vaḥ sa naḥ ||
T02n3011u_001:2792: ete vāṁnāvādaya ādeśā ananvādeśe vā vaktavyāḥ |
T02n3011u_001:2794: dhātā te bhakto'sti dhātā tava bhakto'sti |
T02n3011u_001:2803: pācchabdāntaṁ yadaṅgaṁ bhaṁ tadavayavasya pācchabdasya padādeśaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:2894: sāntasaṁyogasya mahataśca yo nakārastasyopadhāyā dīrgho'sambuddhau sarvanāmasthāne |
T02n3011u_001:2919: ṣāṣṭhadvitvaprakaraṇe ye dve vihite te ubhe samudite abhyastasaṁjñe staḥ |
T02n3011u_001:2931: ṣaḍdhātavo'nye jakṣitiśca saptama ete abhyastasaṁjñāḥ syuḥ |
T02n3011u_001:3009: etaiḥ pratyekaṁ vyavadhāne'pi iṇkubhyāṁ parasya mūrdhanyādeśaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:3042: (116) asya sambuddhau vā'naṅ nalopaśca vā vācyaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:3070: adaso'sāntasya dāt parasya udūtau dasya maśca |
T02n3011u_001:3079: adaso dāt parasyaita īddasya mo bahbarthoktau |
T02n3011u_001:3090: nābhāve kartavye kṛte ca mubhāvo nāsiddhaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:3302: avarṇāntāt paro yaḥ śaturavayavastadantasya num vā śīnadyoḥ |
T02n3011u_001:3315: śapśyanorāt paro yaḥ śaturavayavastadantasya num śīnadyoḥ |
T02n3011u_001:3518: śasprabhṛtayaḥ prāk samā- sāntebhyaḥ | am | ām |
T02n3011u_001:3554: sadṛśaṁ triṣu liṅgeṣu sarvāsu ca vibhaktiṣu |
T02n3011u_001:3555: vacaneṣu ca sarveṣu yanna vyeti tadavyayam ||
T02n3011u_001:3557: āpaṁ caiva halantānāṁ yathā vācā niśā diśā ||
T02n3011u_001:3580: lakārāḥ sakarmakebhyaḥ karmaṇi kartari ca syurakarmakebhyo bhāve kartari ca |

T02n3011u_001:3710: liṭi pare'nabhyāsadhātvavayavasyaikācaḥ prathamasya dve sta ādi- bhūtādacaḥ parasya tu dvitīyasya |
T02n3011u_001:3737: jhaśāṁ jaśaḥ khayāṁ cara iti vivekaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:3772: tiṅ-śidbhyo'nyo dhātoriti vihitaḥ pratyaya etatsaṁjñaḥ syāt | iṭ |
T02n3011u_001:3884: upasargasthānnimittāt parasya loḍādeśasyānīti nasya ṇaḥ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:3913: ṅito lasya parasmaipadamikārāntaṁ yat tasya lopaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:4021: bhūsū etayoḥ sārvadhātuke tiṅi guṇo na |
T02n3011u_001:4043: hetuhetumadbhāvādi liṅ-nimittaṁ tatra bhaviṣyatyarthe lṛṅ kriyāyā aniṣpattau gamyamānāyām |
T02n3011u_001:4230: liṇnimittādeśādikaṁ na bhavati yadaṅgaṁ tadavayavasyāsaṁyuktahalma- dhyasthasyāta etvamabhyāsalopaśca kiti liṭi |
T02n3011u_001:4336: sanādayaḥ karmorṇaṅantāḥ pratyayā ante yeṣāṁ te dhātusaṁjñakāḥ |
T02n3011u_001:4375: dvitvanimitte'ci aca ādeśo na dvitve kartavye |
T02n3011u_001:4388: dānteṣu ad kṣud khid chid tud nud padya bhid vidya vinad vind śad sad svidya skandihadī ṣoḍaśa |
T02n3011u_001:4389: dhānteṣu krudh kṣudh budhya bandh yudh rudh rādh vyadh śudh sādh sidhya ekādaśa |
T02n3011u_001:4391: pānteṣu āp kṣip chup tap tip tṛpya dṛpya lip lup vapśapsvapsṛpastrayodaśa |
T02n3011u_001:4394: śānteṣu kruś daṁś diś dṛś mṛś riś ruś liśviśspṛśo daśa |
T02n3011u_001:4395: ṣānteṣu kṛṣ tviṣ tuṣ dviṣ duṣ puṣya piṣ viṣ śiṣ śuṣ śliṣ ekādaśaṁ |
T02n3011u_001:4397: hānteṣu d-h dih duh nah mih ruh- lihvaho'ṣṭau |
T02n3011u_001:4460: krādibhya eva liṭa iṇna syādanyasmādaniṭo'pi syāt |
T02n3011u_001:4465: upadeśe'janto yo dhātustāsau nityāniṭ tatasthala iṇna |
T02n3011u_001:4470: upadeśe'kāravān yastāsau nityāniṭ tataḥ parasya thala iṇna syāt |
T02n3011u_001:4475: tāsau nityāniṭa ṛdantādeva thalo neḍbhyāradvājasya mate |
T02n3011u_001:4497: ajantāṅgasya dīrgho yādau pratyaye na tu kṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ |
T02n3011u_001:4529: ebhyaḥ śyan vā kartrarthe sārvadhātuke pare |
T02n3011u_001:4587: dhusaṁjñakānāṁ māsthādīnāṁ ca etvaṁ syādhārdhadhātuke kitri liṅi |
T02n3011u_001:4611: upadeśe ejantasya dhātorātvaṁ na tu śiti |
T02n3011u_001:4622: dhumāsthāderanyasya saṁyogāderdhātorāta etvaṁ vārdhadhātuke kiti liṅi |
T02n3011u_001:4629: eṣāṁ sak syādebhyaḥ sica iṭ syāt parasmaipadeṣu |
T02n3011u_001:4665: (168) arteḥ saṁyogāderṛdantasya ca guṇo yaki yādāvārdhadhātuke li- ṅi ca |
T02n3011u_001:4698: asaṁyogapūrvasya pratyayokārasya lopo vā mvoḥ parayoḥ |
T02n3011u_001:5040: caṅpare ṇau yadaṅgaṁ tasya yo'bhyāso ladhuparastasya sanīva kāryaṁ syāṇṇāvaglope'sati |
T02n3011u_001:5083: iṇaḥ paro ya iṭ tataḥ pareṣāṁ ṣīdhvaṁluṅliṭāṁ dhasya vā ḍhaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:5144: vṛtādibhyaḥ pañcabhyo vā parasmaipadaṁ sye sani ca |
T02n3011u_001:5166: śaserdadervakārādīnāṁ guṇaśabdena vihito yo'kārastasya etvābhyā- salopau na |
T02n3011u_001:5185: eṣāmata etvamabhyāsalopaśca kiti liṭi seṭi thali ca |
T02n3011u_001:5249: śe yaki yādāvārdhadhātuke liṅi ṛto riṅ |
T02n3011u_001:5256: ṛvarṇāntāt parau jhalādī liṅsicau kitau stastaṅi |
T02n3011u_001:5348: ṣasya ḍhasya ca kaḥ syāt sakāre pare |
T02n3011u_001:5446: ad ṛ vyeñ ebhyasthalo nityamiṭ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:5502: tanu kṣaṇu kṣiṇu ṛṇu tṛṇu ghṛṇu vanu manu (190)
T02n3011u_001:5586: lugviṣaya uto vṛddhiḥ piti halādau sārvadhātuke na tvabhyastasya |
T02n3011u_001:5605: iha vṛddhirna bhāṣye picca ṅinna ṅicca pinneti vyākhyānāt |
T02n3011u_001:5694: vetterloṭyām guṇābhāvo loṭo lugloḍantakarotyanuprayogaśca nipā- tyate |
T02n3011u_001:5746: upasargeṇaḥ prādusaścāsteḥ sasya ṣo yakāre'ci ca pare |
T02n3011u_001:5821: upasargāt parasya iṇo'ṇo hrasva ārdhadhātuke kiti liṅi |
T02n3011u_001:5978: iksamīpāddhalaḥ parau jhalādī liṅsicau kitau stastaṅi |
T02n3011u_001:6050: bruvo la-ustibādīvāṁ pañcānāṁ ṇalādayaḥ pañca vā syurbruvaścāhā- deśaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:6135: acaḥ parāḥ saṁyogādayo nadarā dvirna bhavanti |
T02n3011u_001:6212: ebhyo liṭyām vā syādāmi ślāviva kāryaṁ ca |
T02n3011u_001:6312: vṛṅvṛñbhyāmṝdantācceṭo dīrgho vā syānna tu liṭi |
T02n3011u_001:6462: dārūpā dhārūpāśca dhātavo dhusaṁjñāḥ syurdāpdaipau vinā |
T02n3011u_001:6490: dviruktasya jhaṣantasya dhāño baśo bhaṣ tathoḥ sdhvośca parataḥ |
T02n3011u_001:6608: eṣāṁ kiti liṭi seṭi thali ca etvābhyāsalopau vā |
T02n3011u_001:6664: eṣāṁ saṁprasāraṇaṁ syāt kiti ṅiti ca |
T02n3011u_001:6914: abhyāsācceḥ kutvaṁ vā sani liṭi ca |
T02n3011u_001:6929: abhyāsasya śapūrvāḥ khayaḥ śiṣyante'nye halo lupyante |
T02n3011u_001:7166: uñchaḥ kaṇaśa ādānaṁ kaṇiśādyarjanaṁ śilamiti yādavaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:7198: ādiśabdaḥ prakāre tena ye'tra nakārānuṣaktāste tṛmphādayaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:7519: tṛhaḥ śnami kṛte im halādau piti |
T02n3011u_001:7908: stanbhvādayaśca- tvāraḥ sautrāḥ sarve rodhanārthāḥ parasmaipadinaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:8030: (254) ekāco grahervihitasyeṭo dīrgho na tu liṭi |
T02n3011u_001:8114: paranimitto'jādeśaḥ sthānivat sthānibhūtādacaḥ pūrvatvena dṛṣṭasya vidhau kartavye |
T02n3011u_001:8151: sani pare yadaṅgaṁ tadavayavābhyāsāta it syāt pavargayaṇjakāreṣva- varṇapareṣu parataḥ |
T02n3011u_001:8188: sannantasya yaṅantasya ca prathamasyaikāco dve sto'jādestu dvitī- yasya |
T02n3011u_001:8229: paunaḥ punye bhṛśārthe ca dyotye dhātorekāco halāderyaṅ |
T02n3011u_001:8244: gatyarthāt kauṭilya eva yaṅ na tu kriyāsamabhihāre |
T02n3011u_001:8282: (263) yaṅo'ci pratyaye luk syāccakārāt taṁ vināpi kvacit |
T02n3011u_001:8294: yaṅlugantāt parasya halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasyeḍvā syāt |
T02n3011u_001:8295: bhūsu- voriti niṣedho yaṅluki bhāṣāyāṁ na |
T02n3011u_001:8352: kyaci kyaṅi ca nāntameva padaṁ nānyat |
T02n3011u_001:8385: upamānāt karmaṇaḥ subantādācāre'rthe kyac putramivācarati putrīyati chātram |
T02n3011u_001:8396: (267) anunāsikāntasyopadhāyā dīrghaḥ syāt kvau jhalādau ca kṅiti |
T02n3011u_001:8426: ebhyo dhātubhyo nityaṁ yak syāt svārthe |
T02n3011u_001:8494: samo dāṇastṛtīyāntena yuktāduktaṁ syāt tṛtīyā ceccaturthyarthe |
T02n3011u_001:8500: sanaḥ pūrvo yo dhātustena tulyaṁ sannantādapyātmanepadaṁ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:8536: kartṛge ca phale gandhanādau ca parasmaipadaṁ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:8587: syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu bhāvakarmaṇorupadeśe'jjhanagraha- dṛśāṁ vā ciṇvadiṭ ca | 6 | 4 | 62 |
T02n3011u_001:8591: upadeśe yo'c tadantānāṁ hanādīnāṁ ca ciṇīvāṅgakāryaṁ vā syāt syādiṣu bhāvakarmaṇorgamyamānayoḥ syādīnāmiḍāgamaśca |
T02n3011u_001:8710: yadā karmaiva kartṛtvena vivakṣitaṁ tadā sakarmakāṇāmapyakarmakatvāt kartari bhāve ca lakāraḥ |
T02n3011u_001:8715: karmasthayā kriyayā tulyakriyaḥ kartā karmavat syāt |
T02n3011u_001:8752: vartamāne ye pratyayā uktāste vartamānasāmīpye bhūte bhaviṣyati ca vā syuḥ |
T02n3011u_001:8793: ātṛtīyāntaṁ ye pratyaṁyāste dhātoḥ pare syuḥ |
T02n3011u_001:8799: asmin dhātvadhikāre'sarūpo'pavādpratyaya utsargasya bādhako vā syāt stryadhikāroktaṁ vinā |
T02n3011u_001:8833: vidhervidhānaṁ bahudhā samīkṣya cāturvidhaṁ bāhulakaṁ vadanti | 1 |
T02n3011u_001:8872: śāsa upadhāyā it syādaṅi halādau kṅiti ca |
T02n3011u_001:8998: aduttarasyānavyayasya visargasya samāse nityaṁ sādeśaḥ karotyādiṣu pareṣu |
T02n3011u_001:9011: aruṣo dviṣato'jantasya ca mumāgamaḥ khidante pare na tvavyaya- sya |
T02n3011u_001:9024: svakarmake manane vartamānānmanyateḥ supi khaś syāt |
T02n3011u_001:9032: manin kvanip vanip vic ete pratyayā dhātoḥ syuḥ |
T02n3011u_001:9134: tatra tayoreveti bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ktaḥ kartari kṛditi kartari ktavatuḥ |
T02n3011u_001:9138: (294) radābhyāṁ niṣṭhāto naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ | 8 | 2 | 42 |
T02n3011u_001:9142: radābhyāṁ parasya niṣṭhātasya no niṣṭhāpekṣayā pūrvasya dhātordasya ca |
T02n3011u_001:9166: aṅgāvayavāddhalaḥ paraṁ yat saṁprasāraṇaṁ tadantasya dīrghaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:9214: ghusaṁjñakasya dā ityasya dath tādau kiti |
T02n3011u_001:9238: aprathamāntena samānādhikaraṇe laṭa etau vā staḥ |
T02n3011u_001:9318: satukkasya chasya vasya ca kramāt ś ūṭh etāvādeśau staḥ kvau anunāsikādau jhalādau kḍiti ca |
T02n3011u_001:9378: (302) ete vartamāne saṁjñāyāṁ ca bahulaṁ syuḥ |
T02n3011u_001:9512: eṣāmupadhāvakārayorūṭh anunāsike kvau jhalādau kṅiti ca |
T02n3011u_001:9633: ivarṇovarṇopadhāddhalāde ralantāt parau ktvāsanau seṭau vā kitau staḥ |
T02n3011u_001:9679: ābhīkṣṇye dyotye pūrvaviṣaye ṇamul ktvā ca |
T02n3011u_001:9684: ābhīkṣṇye vīpsāyāṁ ca dyotye padasya dvitvaṁ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:9695: eṣu kṛño ṇamul syāt siddhau'prayogo yasyaivaṁbhūtaścet kṛñ |
T02n3011u_001:9712: prātipadikārthamātre liṅgamātradyādhikye saṁkhyāmātre ca prathamā syāt |
T02n3011u_001:9789: anabhihite kartari karaṇe ca tṛtīyā syāt |
T02n3011u_001:9811: tena daityebhyo hariralaṁ prabhuḥ samarthaḥ śakta ityādi |
T02n3011u_001:9816: apāyo viśleṣastasmin sādye yaddhruvamavadhibhūtaṁ kārakaṁ tada- pādānasaṁjñaṁ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:9868: (320) padasaṁbandhī yo vidhiḥ sa samarthāśrito bodhyaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:9873: kaḍārāḥ karmadhāraya ityataḥ prāk samāsa ityadhikriyate |
T02n3011u_001:9902: (322) vibhaktyarthādiṣu vartamānamavyayaṁ subantena saha nityaṁ samasyate |
T02n3011u_001:9933: adantādavyayībhāvāt supo na luk tasya pañcamīṁ vinā amādeśaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:9956: sahasya saḥ syādavyayībhāve na tu kāle |
T02n3011u_001:10030: dvitīyāntaṁ śritādiprakṛtikaiḥ subantai saha vā samasyate |
T02n3011u_001:10038: tṛtīyāntaṁ tṛtīyāntārthakṛtaguṇavacanenārthena ca saha vā prāgvat |
T02n3011u_001:10047: kartari karaṇe ca tṛtīyā kṛdantena bahulaṁ prāgvat |
T02n3011u_001:10056: caturthyantārthāya yat tadvācinā arthādibhiśca caturthyantaṁ vā prāgvat |
T02n3011u_001:10101: avayavinā saha pūrvādayaḥ samasyante ekatvasaṁkhyāviśiṣṭaścedavaya- vī |
T02n3011u_001:10121: dvitīyā tṛtīyetyādiyogavibhāgādanyatrāpi dvitīyādi- vibhaktīnāṁ prayogavaśāt samāso jñeyaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:10136: taddhitārthe viṣaye uttarapade ca parataḥ samāhāre ca vācye diksaṁ- khye prāgvat |
T02n3011u_001:10137: pūrvasyāṁ śālāyāṁ bhavaḥ pūrvāśālā iti samāse jāte |
T02n3011u_001:10148: ñiti ṇiti ca taddhiteṣvacāmāderaco vṛddhiḥ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:10151: pañca gāvo dhanaṁ yasyeti tripade bahuvrīhau |
T02n3011u_001:10157: go'ntāt tatpuruṣāṭṭac syāt samāsānto na tu taddhitaluki |
T02n3011u_001:10215: naikadhetyādau tu naśabdena saha sup supeti |
T02n3011u_001:10242: vigrahe yanniyatavibhaktikaṁ tadupasarjanaṁ na tu tasya pūrvanipātaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:10247: upasarjanaṁ yo gośabdaḥ strīpratyayāntaṁ ca tadantasya prātipadikasya hrasvaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:10260: saptamyante pade karmaṇītyādau vācyatvena sthitaṁ yat kumbhādi tadvācakaṁ padamupapadaṁ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:10270: gatikārakopapadānāṁ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṁ prāk subutpatteḥ |
T02n3011u_001:10357: anekaṁ prathamāntamanyasya padasyārthe vartamānaṁ vā samasyate sa bahuvrīhiḥ |
T02n3011u_001:10362: (342) saptamyantaṁ viśeṣaṇaṁ ca bahuvrīhau pūrvaṁ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:10386: uktapuṁskādanūṅ ūṅo'bhāvo yatra tathābhūtasya strīvācakaśabdasya puṁvācakasyeva rūpaṁ samānādhikaraṇe na tu pūraṇyāṁ priyādau ca |
T02n3011u_001:10396: (344) pūraṇārthapratyayāntaṁ yat strīliṅgaṁ tadantāt pramāṇyantācca bahuvrī- herap syāt |
T02n3011u_001:10397: kalyāṇī pañcamī yāsāṁ rātrīṇāṁ tāḥ kalyāṇīpañcamā rātrayaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:10469: eṣviṇa uttarasya visargasya ṣo'nyasya tu saḥ |
T02n3011u_001:10493: anekaṁ subantaṁ cārthe vartamānaṁ vā samasyate sa dvandvaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:10607: ñiti ṇiti ca taddhite pare'cāmāderaco vṛddhiḥ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:10650: ṣaṣṭhyantāt kṛtasaṁdheḥ samarthādapatye'rthe uktā vakṣyamāṇāśca pratyayā vā syuḥ |
T02n3011u_001:10683: gotre yadyañantamañantaṁ ca tadavayavayoretayorluk tatkṛte bahutve na tu striyām |
T02n3011u_001:10690: vaṁśye pitrādau jīvati pautrāderyadapatyaṁ caturthādi tadyuvasaṁjñameva syāt |
T02n3011u_001:10695: yūnyapatye gotrapratyayāntādeva pratyayaḥ syāt striyāṁ tu na yuva- saṁjñā |
T02n3011u_001:10700: yūnyapatye gotrapratyayāntādeva pratyayaḥ syāt striyāṁ tu na yuva- saṁjñā |
T02n3011u_001:10710: pratyayādeḥ phasya āayan ḍhasyaiy khasya īn chasya īy ghasya iy ete syuḥ |
T02n3011u_001:10788: yādau taddhite'n prakṛtyā syānna tu bhāvakarmaṇoḥ |
T02n3011u_001:10842: bahuṣvartheṣu tadrājasya luk tatkṛte bahutve na tu striyām |
T02n3011u_001:10875: pūrveṇa vihitasya lup ṣaṣṭhidaṇḍātmakasya kālasyāvāntaraviśeṣa- ścenna gamyate |
T02n3011u_001:10903: saptamyantādaṇ syāt saṁskṛte'rthe yat saṁskṛtaṁ bhakṣāścet te syuḥ |
T02n3011u_001:10932: akṛdyakāre'sārvadhātuke yakāre cvau ca pare ṛto rīṅādeśaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:10955: iha bhasyāḍhe taddhita iti puṁvadbhāve kṛte |
T02n3011u_001:10992: (366) na yvābhyāṁ padāntābhyāṁ pūrvo tu tābhyāmaic | 7 | 3 | 3 |
T02n3011u_001:10996: padāntābhyāṁ yakāravakārābhyāṁ parasya na vṛddhiḥ kiṁtu tābhyāṁ pūrvo kramādetāvāgamau staḥ |
T02n3011u_001:11062: mavarṇāvarṇāntānmavarṇāvarṇopadhācca yavādivarjitāt parasya mato- rmasya vaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:11097: iha prakṛtiviśeṣādghādayaṣṭyuṭyulantā ucyante teṣāṁ jātādayo'rthaviśeṣāḥ samarthavibhaktayaśca vakṣyante |
T02n3011u_001:11195: (373) maparyantayoranayorekārthavācinostvamau staḥ pratyaye uttarapade ca parataḥ |
T02n3011u_001:11430: akṣairdīvyati khanati jayati jitaṁ vā ākṣikam |
T02n3011u_001:11693: cādbhāve jaḍasya bhāvaḥ karma vā jāḍyam |
T02n3011u_001:11929: dikśabdebhya ityataḥ prāgvakṣyamāṇāḥ pratyayā vibhaktisaṁjñāḥ syuḥ ||
T02n3011u_001:12043: idama eta it etau sto rephādau thakārādau ca prāgdiśīye pare |
T02n3011u_001:12061: eta it etau sto rephādau thādau ca prāgdiśīye |
T02n3011u_001:12103: kima edantāt tiṅo'vyayācca yo ghastadantādāmuḥ syānna tu dravyaprakarṣe |
T02n3011u_001:12239: prācuryeṇa prastutaṁ prakṛtaṁ tasya vacanaṁ pratipādanam |
T02n3011u_001:12273: vikārātmatāṁ prāpnuvatyāṁ prakṛtau vartamānādvikāraśabdāt svārthe cvirvā syāt karotyādibhiryoge |
T02n3011u_001:12279: akṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saṁpadyate taṁ karoti kṛṣṇīkaroti |
T02n3011u_001:12307: (411) dvyajavaraṁ nyūnaṁ na tu tato nyūnam |
T02n3011u_001:12310: ḍāci bahulaṁ dve bhavata iti ḍāci vivakṣite dvitvam |
T02n3011u_001:12312: ḍācparaṁ yadāmreḍitaṁ tasmin pare pūrvaparayorvarṇayoḥ pararūpaṁ syāt |
T02n3011u_001:12330: ajādīnāmakārāntasya ca vācyaṁ yat strītvaṁ tatra dyotye ṭāp syāt |
T02n3011u_001:12355: anupasarjanaṁ yaṭṭidādi tadantaṁ yadadantaṁ tataḥ striyāṁ ṅīp |
T02n3011u_001:12390: halaḥ parasya taddhitayakārasya lopa īti pare |
T02n3011u_001:12396: yañantāt ṣpho vā syāt sa ca taddhitaḥ |
T02n3011u_001:12455: yā pumākhyā puṁyogāt striyāṁ vartate tato ṅīṣ |
T02n3011u_001:12464: pratyayasthāt kāt pūrvasyākārasyekāraḥ syādāpi sa āp supaḥ paro na cet |
T02n3011u_001:12546: (420) pūrvapadasthānnimittāt parasya nasya ṇaḥ syāt saṁjñāyāṁ na tu gakāra- vyavadhāne |
T02n3011u_001:12555: jātivāci yanna ca striyāṁ niyatamayopadhaṁ tato ṅīṣ |
